name: RunLoop.Mode
desc: Modes that a run loop operates in.

items.name: static let common: RunLoop.Mode
items.desc: A pseudo-mode that includes one or more other run loop modes.

items.name: static let `default`: RunLoop.Mode
items.desc: The mode set to handle input sources other than connection objects.

items.name: static let eventTracking: RunLoop.Mode
items.desc: The mode set when tracking events modally, such as a mouse-dragging loop.

items.name: static let modalPanel: RunLoop.Mode
items.desc: The mode set when waiting for input from a modal panel, such as a save or open panel.

items.name: static let tracking: RunLoop.Mode
items.desc: The mode set while tracking in controls takes place.

items.name: init(String)
items.desc: Creates a run loop mode using the specified string value.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a run loop mode using the specified raw string value.
